author: jpieper
msg: In FSFS, correctly handle an end-of-file before seeing the END or
PROPS-END identifier.  If a malformed hash was being read, this could
have returned no error when in fact there was one.
Suggested by: Mike Henderson <michael.d.henderson@lmco.com>
* subversion/libsvn_fs_fs/fs_fs.c
(hash_read): Only ignore eof if it is the first thing we read.

author: jpieper
msg: In FSFS, do not let the temporary file associated with each
transaction be delete on close.  Instead, delete it by hand when the
transaction is purged.  This was the intended behavior but through a
confusion of mine in the APR docstrings it has always been broken.
* subversion/libsvn_fs_fs/fs_fs.c
(svn_fs_fs__create_txn): apr_file_mktemp uses DELONCLOSE by default,
unless you specifically pass flags to use for open.  Pass those
flags.
(svn_fs_fs__purge_txn): Delete the temporary file associated with
the transaction at the same time as deleting the transaction.

author: cmpilato
msg: Subversion Book fixes.
* doc/book/TODO
Un-TODO some stuff done to-night.
* doc/book/book/ch05.xml
(Creating the Layout, and Importing Initial Data): Use 'svn list' to
show the results of the import.
* doc/book/book/ch07.xml
(Advanced Topics): Kill joke about refunds.
(Config): Why do people keep calling these things regular
expressions?  Patterns, people, patterns.
(Special Properties): Fix capitalization of section title.  Move
some svn:mime-type auto-setting info to ...
(Automatic Property Setting): ... a New section.
(Externals Definitions): Clarify how to set the property, and stop
using the term "auxiliary working copies."
(General Vendor Branch Management Procedure): Clarify some vague
stuff (you know, vague like this log message entry).

author: ghudson
msg: Fix a bug in the handling of transaction-opening errors in the
libsvn_repos commit editor.
* libsvn_repos/commit.c (open_root): It is unwise to assume that
svn_repos_fs_begin_txn_for_commit will leave its first argument
alone in case of error.  We don't want to clean up a
partially-constructed transaction if something goes wrong, so
pass a pointer to a temporary variable and only assign it to
eb->txn on success.

author: ghudson
msg: In FSFS, fix spurious commit failures with "Transaction out of date"
errors.
* libsvn_fs_fs/tree.c
(svn_fs_fs__commit_txn): After merging changes, reset the base_rev
of the transaction to youngish_rev so that svn_fs_fs__commit can
properly check for an out-of-date transaction.
